overview: In recent years a radical new adult service, Man Trap, has been testing our lovers’ faithfulness. For the first time ever Kelly Rafelle, the brains and beauty behind Man Trap, talks candidly with award winning journalist Oliver McDowell. Through a series of raunchy reconstructions, he exposed the true stories behind her “girls” and controversial agency. Is Rafelle the home-wreckers the headlines would have us belive? Or could she actually be a champion of truth and reconciliation?
title: Man Trap
